meanings.definition: A person or thing that rotates.
meanings.sent1: The playground carousel has colorful rotators that spin around.
meanings.sent2: The windmill's rotators turned with each gust of wind.
meanings.sent3: The rotators on the clock made the time fly by.
meanings.sent4: The rotators on the merry-go-round created a whirl of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The rotators on the fan kept the room cool and breezy.

meanings.definition: Muscles that cause a part of the body to rotate.
meanings.sent1: The dancer's strong rotators allowed her to twirl gracefully.
meanings.sent2: During the exercise, the rotators in your core help with twisting movements.
meanings.sent3: The rotators in his neck made him look like an owl when he turned quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her rotators felt sore after all the spinning in the dance class.
meanings.sent5: The rotators in his shoulders helped him swing the bat with power.

meanings.definition: A device that rotates an object.
meanings.sent1: The microwave has a rotators inside to ensure even cooking.
meanings.sent2: The pottery wheel's rotators help shape the clay into beautiful vases.
meanings.sent3: The rotators in the car engine make sure all parts move smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The rotators in the washing machine spin the clothes clean.
meanings.sent5: The rotators in the record player turn the vinyl for music to play.
